title: Simple Present or Present Continuous Tense Exercise

exercises.title: Simple Present Or Present Continuous Tense

questions.question: Martin ……………….. in his garage.
questions.description: We use the present continuous to talk about actions and situations that are going on at the moment of speaking.

questions.question: Martin ………………. fixing things.
questions.description: The simple present is used to talk about our habits, preferences, hobbies etc.

questions.question: What ………………… for breakfast?
questions.description: If the arrangement already exists, we use the present continuous to talk about the future.

questions.question: I ……………….. France this summer.
questions.description: If the arrangement already exists, we use the present continuous to talk about the future.

questions.question: I ………………. France every summer.
questions.description: We use the simple present to talk about our habits and routines.

questions.question: ………………….. on any new projects at the moment?
questions.description: We use the present continuous to talk about actions and situations that are going on at the moment of speaking.

questions.question: ……………. on Sundays?
questions.description: The question is about habits or routines.

questions.question: How often ……………….. ?
questions.description: The question is about habits or routines.

questions.question: Susie …………….. here often.
questions.description: The statement is about habits or routines.

questions.question: ………………. with us to the movies?
questions.description: The question is about arrangement that already exists.

questions.question: ………………. what ……………..?
answers: Is she knowing, she is doing
Does she know, she is doing

exercises.title: Simple Present Or Present Continuous Tense Exercise

questions.question: She is Italian - She ......................... from Rome.
I .............................. my holiday in France.
questions.description: We use the present continuous tense to talk about actions or situations that are going on at the moment of speaking.

questions.question: What ........................... snakes .......................?
questions.description: The present simple is used to talk about permanent situations.

questions.question: I ........................... my grandparents every week.
questions.description: We use the present simple to talk about our habits, routines etc.

questions.question: I .......................... never to smoke again.
questions.description: The present simple is used in promises.

questions.question: How …………….. I ……………. to the railway station?
questions.description: The simple present is used when we ask for and give directions.

questions.question: I ……………. this fragrance very much.
questions.description: Like is one of those verbs that are not normally used in the continuous form.

questions.question: Why ……………….. you …………….? Is something wrong?
questions.description: The present continuous tense is used to talk about temporary situations that are going on around now.

questions.question: Why ……………. you …………… on the table?
questions.description: The present continuous is used to talk about temporary situations.

questions.question: The castle ……………….. on a hill outside the town.
questions.description: The present simple is used to talk about more permanent situations.

questions.question: ………….. you …………….. in ghosts?
questions.description: Believe is not normally used in the continuous form.

questions.question: I ………………. them almost every day.
questions.description: The present simple is used to talk about things that happen regularly.

questions.description: We use the simple present to talk about our habits and routines.

questions.question: I ....................... people who ........................... rude to their subordinates.

questions.question: I ......................... this music.

questions.question: ............................. the meat ........................ bad?

questions.question: I .............................. the dentist at 11 am.

questions.question: I ........................... what you mean?
questions.description: When see means understand, it is not used in the continuous form.

questions.question: He ........................... his dog out for a walk every day before breakfast.
